scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a man, likely King David, in profile, playing a harp. He wears a distinctive hat and a richly patterned garment. His long beard and wavy hair are visible. Above and to the right of the harp, a star is depicted. The figure is shown in a seated or stooping posture, with his left hand on the harp and his right hand extended, pointing downwards. The scene is framed by a border, and the background contains decorative elements and stars, suggesting a celestial or symbolic setting.
